post_title: HOF Portraits for sale (and a Duffy Sov460)
post_content:
Prices assume a no-fee payment method.  PP Goods is ok, just add the 3.5% fee.  I have to collect sales tax if I'm shipping to a WA state address.

Bender Portrait PSA 5 $850
Brown Portrait PSA 2 $450
Clarke Portrait PSA 4 $375
Duffy Sov460 SGC 3 $289
